LanguageData.AS_WHE_Scenario.label: The end of our escape.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Scenario.description: They are a group of half-elves who escaped after being hunted by the people of the Space Race. There are three at the start, and seven others who have been scattered during their escape.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Scenario.scenario.name: The end of our escape.
